full_title_en: Pediatric Asthma Severity Score (PASS) for Asthma Exacerbation Severity
medium_description_en: Determines pediatric asthma severity based on physical exam findings.
instructions_en: Applicable to pediatric patients 1-18 years of age.

seo.meta_description_en: The Pediatric Asthma Severity Score (PASS) determines severity of pediatric asthma based on physical exam findings.
seo.keywords_en: Asthma, peds, breathing, wheezing, gorelick, marc gorelick,

how_to_use.use_case_en: Pediatric patients (1-18 years old) with asthma exacerbations.
how_to_use.pearls_pitfalls_en:
• The Pediatric Asthma Severity Score (PASS) provides a method for predicting likelihood of admission or extended ED stay.
  • The PASS uses variables such as work of breathing (commonly used in decision to admit), and thus it may over-estimate score's utility.
how_to_use.why_use_en: This score can help decide which patients need admission, especially when providers disagree or the patient may be “borderline” for needing admission.

next_steps.advice_en: The PASS score works best when done initially and after treatment to show a trend, but this may be the same as clinician reassessment as well.

about.more_info_en: The PASS Score uses a cut off value of 2 points as indication for potential admission to PICU.

Original/Primary Reference.text: Gorelick MH, et al. Performance of a novel clinical score, the Pediatric Asthma Severity Score (PASS), in the evaluation of acute asthma.Acad Emerg Med. 2004 Jan;11(1):10-8.

Validation.text: Gouin S, et al. Prospective evaluation of two clinical scores for acute asthma in children 18 months to 7 years of age. Acad Emerg Med. 2010 Jun;17(6):598-603

creator_info.about_en: Marc Gorelick, MD, is an affiliate professor of pediatrics at the University of Minnesota Medical School. He is also president and CEO of Children's Hospitals and Clinics of Minnesota. Dr. Gorelick's primary research is focused on pediatric oncology and emergency assessment of pediatric patients.

options.label: Severe wheezing or absent due to poor air movement
